subSection.paragraph: This species has been reared from rotting stems and bark of several native Hawaiian plant species, including Pisonia , Charpentiera , Urera and Hibiscadelphus .

subSubSection.paragraph: HAWAIIAN ISLANDS: Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, Hawaii
